s0332: King You second year, the Western Zhou three rivers all shook.
s0334: The qi of heaven and earth do not lose their order;
s0335: If they lose their order, it is because the people are in chaos.
s0336: Yang is suppressed and cannot emerge, yin presses and cannot rise, therefore there are earthquakes.
s0337: Now the three rivers are shaking, this is yang losing its place and being filled by yin.
s0338: Yang is the ruler, yin is the minister; ruler yielding to minister, this is the Way of Zhou perishing.'
s0339: King You was fond of Bao Si, made her queen, deposed Shen Hou and the crown prince.
s0340: The crown prince's mother died early. Hui Queen gave birth to Shu Dai.
s0341: King You wanted to establish Shu Dai as crown prince, Shen Hou did not agree.
s0342: King You was angry, Shen Hou fled to Shen.
s0343: King You attacked Shen, Shen Hou called on the Quanrong to help.
s0344: The Quanrong attacked Zhou, captured King You at Li Mountain, killed him.
s0345: The Quanrong attacked Haojing, took Bao Si.
s0346: The common people made the crown prince Ji Nie king, this was King Ping.
s0347: King Ping moved east to Luoyi, this was the Eastern Zhou.
s0348: Shen Hou returned, became queen mother.
s0349: King Ping first year, the Quanrong again invaded the west.
s0353: Fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.
s0354: Sixth year, Xi Fu Ren, a woman from Chen, passed through Cai, Cai did not show courtesy, hated her.
s0355: Chu attacked Cai, captured Duke Ai and returned.
s0356: Seventh year, Duke Huan of Song, Yu Yue, first year.
s0361: Eleventh year, Duke Xiang of Song, Zi Fu, first year.
s0363: Twelfth year, Duke Xiang of Song, Zi Fu, first year.
s0366: Fourteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.
s0367: Fifteenth year, Duke Mu of Qin, first year.
s0368: Sixteenth year, Xun Xi used treasures to borrow passage from Yu to attack Guo, extinguished Xia Yang.
s0369: Seventeenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.
s0370: Eighteenth year, Duke Zhuang of Zheng, Wu Sheng, first year.
s0371: Nineteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.
s0373: Twentieth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.
s0374: Twenty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.
s0375: Twenty-second year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.
s0376: Twenty-third year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.
s0377: Twenty-fourth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.
s0378: Twenty-fifth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.
s0379: Twenty-sixth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.
s0380: Twenty-seventh year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.
s0381: Twenty-eighth year, Xun Xi used treasures to borrow passage from Yu to attack Guo, extinguished Xia Yang.
s0382: Twenty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.
